description: If you’re looking for a new salad to make, try this Thai beef salad recipe. It’s packed with zesty flavours and plenty of crunch.
keywords: Thai beef salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: "Make Your Own" Thai Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 small red chilli, thinly sliced diagonally
2 Lebanese cucumbers, halved lengthways, thinly sliced diagonally
1 small red onion, halved lengthways, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice stick noodles in a large saucepan of boiling water as per packet instructions.

Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add steaks and cook for 4 minutes each side for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Cover to keep warm. Rest for 5 minutes. Combine sweet chilli sauce, lime juice, fish sauce and sugar in a jug.
Thinly slice steak. Combine on a platter with noodles, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, herbs, chilli and shallots. Spoon over half of the sauce and serve with remainder on the side.
